query:
SELECT 
  id,
  task_id,
  title,
  duration,
  CASE 
    WHEN audio_url IS NOT NULL AND audio_url != '' THEN '✅ 有音檔'
    ELSE '❌ 無音檔'
  END as audio_status,
  created_at
FROM podcast_highlights
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LtHxqrZriiUHME1.0a62a726ab17 --database kf362K9uEYqJammqLrrUaT --execute SELECT 
  id,
  task_id,
  title,
  duration,
  CASE 
    WHEN audio_url IS NOT NULL AND audio_url != '' THEN '✅ 有音檔'
    ELSE '❌ 無音檔'
  END as audio_status,
  created_at
FROM podcast_highlights
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
